login_page_url = "/login" home_page_url = "/" proadmin_attention_url = "/proadmin_attention" license_url = "/license"
vdom_container = None
def set_vdom_container(cont): global vdom_container vdom_container = cont
def redirect(url): if vdom_container: vdom_container.action("goTo", [url]) else: response.redirect(url)
def authenticated(method): def wrapper(*args, **kwargs): if ProAdmin.current_user() is None: from utilities import get_logout_back_url session['error'] = [(get_localization()["auth_error.text"], )] redirect("{login_url}?back_url={url}".format( login_url=login_page_url, url=get_logout_back_url()) )
# if session['embeded']: # redirect(home_page_url) # return method() return wrapper
def embeded(method): def wrapper(*args, **kwargs): is_embeded = session['embeded'] if not is_embeded: return method() else: redirect(home_page_url) return wrapper
def administrator(method): def wrapper(*args, **kwargs): current_user = ProAdmin.current_user() if bool(ProAdmin.application().rules(subject=current_user, access='a')): return method() else: redirect(home_page_url) return wrapper
def local_scheme(method): def wrapper(*args, **kwargs): if ProAdmin.scheme().is_remote(): redirect(proadmin_attention_url) else: return method() return wrapper
def error_handler(method): def wrapper(*args, **kwargs): try: return method() except RenderTermination: raise except Exception, ex: from traceback import print_exc print_exc() # raise #session[ "error" ] = unicode(ex) #redirect( home_page_url ) return wrapper
def active_directory_scheme(method): def wrapper(*args, **kwargs): if ProAdmin.scheme().type == "active_directory": return method() return wrapper

import requests import urllib
class WoleetApi: def __init__(self): # TODO: remove values to None and set them througn set_api_config # "https://api-preprod.woleet.io/v1 # "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiI3MWZjZmU2Ny1jZjYwLTQ4NWYtYTFlYS01ZWM5MWQxODQyYmIiLCJpYXQiOjE2NDY0MTA3MDB9.WUgGJjwL-Gk5knm0dfDg3f2vsYiXJWC7TWp7PtXC6wA" self.API_URL = None self.API_KEY = None self.API_HEADERS = None self.API_CALLBACK_URL = None
def set_api_config(self, url, key, callback_url=None): self.API_URL = url self.API_KEY = key self.API_HEADERS = { "Authorization": "Bearer "+ self.API_KEY, "Accept": "application/json", "Content-Type": "application/json" } self.API_CALLBACK_URL = callback_url
def __class_has_params(self): result = False if not (self.API_KEY and self.API_URL and self.API_HEADERS) else False return result
def __handle_response(self, message, response): """Handle Woleet api responses
Args: message (str): message about the passed request response (dict, optional): woleet api response to passed request
Returns: dict, optional: woleet api response result """ from VEE_core import engine engine.engine_logger.info(message.format(response.status_code, response.reason))
result = { "state": "error", "data": { "status_code": response.status_code, "reason": response.reason } } try: response.raise_for_status() parsed = response.json() if "apiException" not in parsed: result = {"state": "success", "data": parsed} else: engine.engine_logger.info("Error: {}".format(parsed)) except: pass return result
def create_request(self, signee_emails, file_hash, options={}): """Create a signing request
Args: signee_emails (list): list of signatories emails file_hash (str): Sha256 of contract file options (dict, optional): additional parameters to pass to the request. Defaults to {}.
Returns: dict, optional: woleet api response result """
file_name = options.get("fileName", "File") service_name = options.get("serviceName", application.name) email_template = options.setdefault("emailTemplate", "") eac_guid = options.setdefault("eacGuid", "") create_request_url = "{}/signatureRequest".format(self.API_URL) signees = [{"email": k, "commonName": v} for k, v in options.get("emailToName", {}).items()]
json_data = { "authorizedSignees": signees, "hashToSign": file_hash, "name": file_name, "fileName": file_name, "state": "DRAFT", "vars": { "serviceName": service_name, "signatureRequestSigneeEmailContentTemplate": email_template, "signatureRequestSigneeEmailSubjectTemplate": "Please sign $fileName", "signatureAttestationEmailDisabled": True, "signatureReminderSigneeEmailDisabled": True, "signatureRequestSigneeEmailHeader0Key":"EAC-Token", "signatureRequestSigneeEmailHeader0Value":eac_guid, "signatureRequestSigneeEmailHeader1Key":"EAC-Method", "signatureRequestSigneeEmailHeader1Value":"update", "signatureRequestSigneeEmailHeader2Key":"EAC-Content-Type", "signatureRequestSigneeEmailHeader2Value":r"text/wholexml", } } if self.API_CALLBACK_URL: json_data["callbackURL"] = self.API_CALLBACK_URL
r = requests.post(create_request_url, headers=self.API_HEADERS, json=json_data) return self.__handle_response("Create Signature Request ({}): {}", r)
def get_request(self, request_id): """Gets the status of the created request
Args: request_id (str): id of created request
Returns: dict, optional: woleet api response result """ get_request_url = "{}/signatureRequest/{}".format(self.API_URL, request_id) r = requests.get(get_request_url, headers=self.API_HEADERS) return self.__handle_response("Get Signature Request ({}): {}", r)
def start_request(self, request_id): """Sends a request to change the status of the request to "PENDING"
Args: request_id (str): id of created request
Returns: dict, optional: woleet api response result """ start_request_url = "{}/signatureRequest/{}/transition".format(self.API_URL, request_id) r = requests.post(start_request_url, headers=self.API_HEADERS, json="PENDING") return self.__handle_response("Start Signature Request ({}): {}", r)
def sign_request(self, request_id, signee_id): """Sends a request to sign document by user
Args: request_id (str): id of created request signee_id (str): id of user created request
Returns: dict, optional: woleet api response result """ sign_request_url = "{}/signatureRequest/{}/delegate".format(self.API_URL, request_id) r = requests.post(sign_request_url, headers=self.API_HEADERS, json={ "signeeId": signee_id }) return self.__handle_response("Sign Request Document ({}): {}", r)
def cancel_request(self, request_id): """Sends a request to change the status of the request to "CANCELED"
Args: request_id (str): id of created request
Returns: dict, optional: woleet api response result """ start_request_url = "{}/signatureRequest/{}/transition".format(self.API_URL, request_id) r = requests.post(start_request_url, headers=self.API_HEADERS, json="CANCELED") return self.__handle_response("Close Signature Request ({}): {}", r)
